{{Description|Spring finds the fortress, as birds in feather fly.<br>Moon gilded in burnished bronze, ancient odes sung by stone.<br>Lost in thought, drifting in dreams, recalling the magnificent scene before finding it once more.}}
'''Gazing Up at Eternity, Looking Down at the World''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* Available throughout the entirety of Version 4.3 (2023/12/20 11:00 UTC+8 - 2024-01-31 05:59 UTC+8)

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* Genshin Impact X Sanxingdui Museum Collaboration Event is now available!
* Reach Adventure Rank 5 or above to claim the event-exclusive Furnishing "[[Bronze Curio: Ancient Golden Visage]]" from the event page!
* You can only claim the reward for this event once.

==Total Rewards==
{{Event Rewards
|Bronze Curio: Ancient Golden Visage = 1
|sort  = Bronze Curio: Ancient Golden Visage
}}
